job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtltugtabout usltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtat wework we provide inspiring and flexible workplace solutions to help businesses small medium or large thrive in more than cities globally the future of work is happening right now and we are leading this moment united by a common purpose here we will empower tomorrows world at work join us on our journey as we give our members the freedom and support to push boundaries in their industries and work to redefine our ownltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtabout the opportunityltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtwework is hiring a frontend software engineer to build and maintain the services that power our internal and memberfacing applications hundreds of thousands of members around the world rely on these services to book spaces at wework locations get support learn about and gain entry to their building invite guests and work efficiently while in our spaces wework is adapting to the realities of covid and seeking to support new members and new flexibility in coworking space and our technology must rapidly adapt to support the business this role will be working on an established team of experienced engineers responsible for multiple services and will have a direct impact on executive level initiativesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtabout youltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtenjoy working in an agile development environment and taking initiatives in improving systems for the sake of your teammates and our usersltligtltligtable to utilize design coding patterns tools and frameworks and methods to facilitate in effectively meeting the team sprint objectives and the overall quarterly team objectivesltligtltligtas excited to write tests and docs as you are to write readable and efficient codeltligtltligtcan drive feature development endtoend and deliver large projects at quarterly levelltligtltligtcomfortable working with product managers designers data scientists peer engineering leads and managers and nontechnical executive stakeholdersltligtltligtflexible attitude and able to adapt to rapidly changing requirements and business needsltligtltligteager to dive in and contribute to longlived systems and improve them for the sake of our members and for your fellow engineers without getting stuck on ensuring perfectionltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtrequirementsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtbachelor degree in computer science and years of experience developing web applications or equivalent experienceltligtltligtstrong knowledge and experience using javascript es ltligtltligtstrong experience using single pages application technologies like react redux typescript and css extensions sass or lessltligtltligtintegrated with different api resources like restful apis apollo graphql or jsonschema to support the frontend clientsltligtltligtexperience working with map sdks like google maps mapbox leaflet or openlayers is a plusltligtltligtpreferred experience writing unit and end to end tests with frameworks like jest and puppeteerltligtltligtcomfortable with aws postgresqlmysql docker circleci npm yarn and githubltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltstronggtlife at weworkltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtbeing a weworker is more than just a job we believe the magic of work is sparked by the passion you bring the places you go the people you meet and the purpose you follow and it starts here here you will brush shoulders with those who dare to dream and do here you will be welcomed by a diverse community that embraces and inspires youbecause together we can achieve more here we challenge ideas and explore new ways of getting things done whether you are part of our ltugtemployee community groupsltugt or part of a global project we ask you to bring your openminded attitude and collaborative spirit in return you will be part of a team where your unique perspectives are celebratedltbrgtltbrgtwework is proud to be an equal employment opportunity and affirmative action employer we do not discriminate based upon gender sexual orientation marital or civil status pregnancy or pregnancyrelated conditions gender identity or expression transgender status or gender reassignment race color national origin or ancestry citizenship religion or religious beliefs age physical or mental disability genetic information including genetic testing and characteristics military or veteran status or any other grounds or characteristic that is protected under the lawltbrgtltbrgtas part of our commitment to health and safety wework like a growing number of employers is requiring all us employees to be fully vaccinated for covid as a condition of employment absent a legal exception for reasonable accommodation we provide unvaccinated new hires a day grace period after their start date to get fully vaccinated or if eligible obtain a reasonable accommodation if you believe that a legal exception may apply to you please still apply for any roles you are interested in and if you are hired you will receive instructions on how to request a reasonable accommodation after your start date please note that roles that require inperson work currently within our community excluding member experience facilities management including security sales excluding sales ops and member technology teams will not be eligible for workfromhome as an accommodation because it poses an undue hardship on our business
